title: Restaurant Order
description: Order a meal at a restaurant like a local

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Good evening! Welcome to Riverside Grill. Table for one?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Right this way. Here's your menu. Can I start you off with something to drink?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: I'll have a glass of sparkling water, please.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Of course. Are you ready to order, or do you need a few minutes?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: I think I'm ready. What do you recommend?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Our grilled salmon is very popular. It comes with seasonal vegetables.

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: That sounds great. I'll have the salmon.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Excellent choice. Would you like to add a side salad or soup?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: I'll add a Caesar salad, please.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Perfect. Any allergies or dietary restrictions I should know about?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Great. Your order will be ready in about 15 minutes.
